long_description: The E-Case eSeries 9 case is perfect for large smartphones or other similarly sized devices. It offers moisture protection when you're out in wet weather or enjoying the water. Tough, completely transparent polyurethane windows are soft enough to let you view and use the touch screen without removing device from the case. PVC-free polyurethane material resists UV damage, so it remains transparent. SealLock(TM) closure helps ensure waterproof performance down to 1m for 30 min. The E-Case eSeries 9 case attaches to a kayak deck or pack straps using cords or clips (not included) and 2 corner lash points.
short_description: The E-Case eSeries 9 case is perfect for large smartphones or other similarly sized devices. It offers moisture protection when you're out in wet weather or enjoying the water.
